Direct Translation: See Peter Woetmann Christoffersen's translation at "The Copenhagen Chansonnier and the ‘Loire Valley’ Chansonniers".
Poetic Translation: Tell me your every thought and feeling;

Lyrics: car j’ay desir de les savoir.
Poetic Translation: All of your dreams I want to know.
All of yourself I beg you show:
I know I will find each thought appealing.
Fearing the things that you’re concealing,

Lyrics: c’est pour mieulx a mon cas pourvoir.
Poetic Translation: Would it be best for me to go?
Tell me your every thought and feeling;

Lyrics: car j’ay desir de les savoir.
Poetic Translation: All of your dreams I want to know.
Is it your doubt you fear revealing?

Lyrics: est ce bien pour me decepvoir?
Poetic Translation: Will you deceive or bring me low?
Detailed accounts to me you owe
So I can be sure and start healing.
Tell me your every thought and feeling;

Lyrics: car j’ay desir de les savoir.
Poetic Translation: All of your dreams I want to know.
All of yourself I beg you show:
I know I will find each thought appealing.
